Headline: NYT Articles for 100 Days of Trump
Text: A collection of NYT Articles written during President Trump's first 100 days.
Media Caption: The New York Times Developers

Headline: For Trump
Text: Everything Is a Rating
Media: Donald J. Trump embellished his “Apprentice” ratings and the number of floors in Trump Tower. As president, he has continued using suspect math. Found at: https://www.nytimes.com/2017/01/24/arts/television/for-trump-everything-is-a-rating.html

Headline: The Numbers Game of Donald Trump
Text: Mr. Trump has long deployed what he described in his first book, “The Art of the Deal,” as “truthful hyperbole,” and what others might call lies. Found at: https://www.nytimes.com/2017/01/22/us/donald-trump-numbers-game.html

Headline: Donald Trump and the Theater of Access
Text: The press may not yet know how to cover the president, but the president knows exactly what to do with the press: Humiliate them. Found at: https://www.nytimes.com/2017/01/27/magazine/donald-trump-and-the-theater-of-access.html

Headline: Trump Vows to Dismantle Dodd-Frank ‘Disaster’
